MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:14pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Linn Drive substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
